data.content:
verb
snorts; snorted; snorting
[no obj] :to force air noisily through your nose
The old dog snorted like a pig when it smelled food.
He snorted with disgust.
[no obj] :to express dislike, disapproval, anger, or surprise by snorting
She snorted at his suggestion that he could fix the sink himself.
[+ obj] :to say (something) with a snort or while snorting
Yeah, you're a writer, and I'm the King of Spain! he snorted.
[+ obj] :to take (a drug) into your body by inhaling it through your nose
They were snorting cocaine.
noun
plural snorts
[count] an act or the sound of noisily forcing air through the nose :an act or the sound of snorting
the snorts of a pig/horse/bull
a snort of laughter/derision/disapproval
an amount of a drug taken into the body by inhaling it through the nose
a snort of cocaine

Danh từ
tiếng gáy
